content: cosy cable headband cosy cable headband by wendy poole share on instagram @wendypooledesigns #wendypooleinstitches measurements and size options to fit a medium size female head measuring 21 around the crown approximately 23cm this can adjusted to any size yarn quantities and needles this patterns knits up to a standard uk weight chunky yarn yarn used king cole timeless chunky = 1 x 100g ball shade = antique cream total metredge on 1 x 100 gram ball = 155m needle size 6mm 1 cable needle 2 ring style stitch-markers are useful but optional either a tapestry or wool type sewing needle for sewing up your headband at the end 1 © wendy poole 2023 for personal use only www wendypoole com cosy cable headband gauge working stocking stitch using 6mm needles width 14 stitches = 10cm length 20 row = 10cm use of a ring stitch-marker when knitting the headband i like to place a ring style stitch-marker on the needle 6 stitches in from each edge between the 9 stitch cable and the garter stitch border this just means that you automatically can see where the cable starts at a glance this is completely optional and you can knit the headband without using a stitch- marker if you prefer abbreviations and techniques cn = cable needle k = knit p = purl sl = slip_stitch across from the left to the right needle sm = slip the stitch marker across from the left needle to the right needle st / sts = stitch / stitches wyif = with yarn in front cable instructions c3f sl 3 sts to cn and hold in front of the work k3 from the left needle then k3 from cable needle c3b sl 3 sts to cn and hold at the back of the work k3 from the left needle then k3 from cable needle 2 © wendy poole 2023 for personal use only www wendypoole com cosy cable headband headband instructions cast on 21 sts foundation row - wrong side sl 1 wyif k5 place 1st stitch marker onto the right needle p9 place 2nd stitch marker onto the right needle k6 by placing stitch markers after the first 6 stitches and before the last 6 stitches means that there will be 9 stitches in the middle panel right side row 1 sl 1 wyif k5 sm k9 sm k6 row 2 wrong side and all wrong side row sl 1 wyif k5 sm p9 sm k6 row 3 cable row sl 1 k5 sm c3f k3 sm k6 row 4 repeat row 2 row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 cable row sl 1 wyif k5 sm k3 c3b sm k6 row 8 repeat row 2 repeat row 1 8 until piece measures 19 or desired length to fit snuggly around the head from beginning ending on a wrong side row with row 8 being the finishing row cast off in pattern leaving a 12 long end for
